entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sechelt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:16 AM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Wet snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
